mapper.select: select id from sec_first_department where department_name = #{departmentName} limit 0,1

SELECT f1.id, f2.id as id2, f2.sequence as sequence2, f1.sequence, f1.department_name, f2.*, ( SELECT count(*) FROM sec_doctor_multipoint s1 WHERE s1.department_id = f2.id ) AS count FROM sec_first_department f1 LEFT JOIN sec_second_department f2 ON f1.id = f2.first_department_id ORDER BY f1.sequence
